control_attributes.control_description: The organization tests the incident response capability for the information system [Assignment: organization-defined frequency] using [Assignment: organization-defined tests] to determine the incident response effectiveness and documents the results.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization coordinates incident handling capability for insider threats across [Assignment: organization-defined components or elements of the organization].

Control Statement: The organization tests the incident response capability for the information system [Assignment: organization-defined frequency] using [Assignment: organization-defined tests] to determine the incident response effectiveness and documents the results.
